column4: Hi all, I am trying to setup a ticketing system (user support) on ubuntu server. The system needs to be able to read email from Gmail (either real time or thru a pull using a cron job), will I need to setup a Mail Delivery Agent or a Mail Transfer Agent to do what I want?
unless you have a paid gmail account, I don't think gmail will allow you to use pop3 services
gmail imap is free but yes i am on enterprise gmail :)
I don't see a problem, write it in c# it's probably easiest. otherwise use php and mysql for your db
